com.badlogic.gdx.backends.iosrobovm

Class IOSMini2DxGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.iosrobovm.IOSMini2DxGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Application

    public class IOSMini2DxGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Application
    Launches iOS-based mini2Dx games. Based on LibGDX's IOSApplication class

      • getBounds

        protected org.robovm.apple.coregraphics.CGRect getBounds()
        GL View spans whole screen, that is, even under the status bar. iOS can also rotate the screen, which is not handled consistently over iOS versions. This method returns, in pixels, rectangle in which libGDX draws.
        Returns:
        dimensions of space we draw to, adjusted for device orientation
